Precompiled Libraries

Included page: .FlexOvl.DeviceInstallation.SetUp (edit)

import
com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests

script
start scoped giv wen zen for slim deviceinstallation Test not run



Narrative


In order to test the correct installation of a device
As a OSP I want to make sure the owner organisation can stop a device test

Implemented Scenarios:

  • Successfully stop device test
  • Unsuccessfully stop device test


Scenario: Stop device test


scenario stop device test succes matrix device organisation status ismessagesent result description
given a stop device test request for device @device
and the stop device test request refers to a device @device with status @status
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation @organisation
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then the stop device test request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId @device
and a stop device test oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent
and an ovl stop device test message with result @result should be sent to the ovl out queue


stop device test succes matrix
device organisation status ismessagesent result description
device-01 ORGANISATION-01 active true OK
scenario stop device test succes matrix device organisation status ismessagesent result description
given a stop device test request for device device-01
and the stop device test request refers to a device device-01 with status active
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation ORGANISATION-01
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then the stop device test request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device-01
and a stop device test oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be true
and an ovl stop device test message with result OK should be sent to the ovl out queue

Parameters:

  • device: device identification
  • organisation: the organisation.
  • status: active, unknown, unregistered; should always be active for success scenario
  • correlationId: correlationId of the message
  • isgenerated: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a correlationID is generated
  • isqueued: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a message is added to the queue
  • result: OK (correlationID is returned) or exception


Scenario: Stop device test with incorrect parameters


scenario stop device test failure matrix device organisation status ismessagesent
given a stop device test request for device @device
and the stop device test request refers to a device @device with status @status
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation @organisation
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then a stop device test oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent


stop device test failure matrix
device organisation status ismessagesent
device-01 ORGANISATION-01 unknown false
scenario stop device test failure matrix device organisation status ismessagesent
given a stop device test request for device device-01
and the stop device test request refers to a device device-01 with status unknown
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation ORGANISATION-01
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then a stop device test oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false
device-01 ORGANISATION_ID_UNKNOWN unknown false
scenario stop device test failure matrix device organisation status ismessagesent
given a stop device test request for device device-01
and the stop device test request refers to a device device-01 with status unknown
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation ORGANISATION_ID_UNKNOWN
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then a stop device test oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false
device-01 ORGANISATION_ID_EMPTY unknown false
scenario stop device test failure matrix device organisation status ismessagesent
given a stop device test request for device device-01
and the stop device test request refers to a device device-01 with status unknown
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation ORGANISATION_ID_EMPTY
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then a stop device test oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false
device-01 ORGANISATION_ID_SPACES unknown false
scenario stop device test failure matrix device organisation status ismessagesent
given a stop device test request for device device-01
and the stop device test request refers to a device device-01 with status unknown
and the stop device test request refers to an organisation ORGANISATION_ID_SPACES
and the stop device test oslp message from the device
when the stop device test request is received
then a stop device test oslp message is sent to device device-01 should be false


Parameters:

  • device: device identification
  • organisation: the organisation; the constants are used in StopDeviceTestSteps[?]
  • status: active, unknown, unregistered; should always be active for success scenario
  • isgenerated: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a correlationID is generated
  • isqueued: boolean (true/false) indicating whether a message is added to the queue
  • result: OK (correlationID is returned) or exception



Scenario: Receive A Stop Device Test Response Request

scenario stop device test response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a stop device test response request with correlationId @correlationid and deviceId @deviceid
and a stop device test response message with correlationId @correlationid, deviceId @deviceid2, qresult @qresult and qdescription @qdescription is found in the queue @isfound
when the stop device test response request is received
then the stop device test response request should return a stop device test response with result @result and description @description

stop device test response input values
correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
cid-01 device-01 true device-01 OK OK
scenario stop device test response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a stop device test response request with correlationId cid-01 and deviceId device-01
and a stop device test response message with correlationId cid-01, deviceId device-01, qresult OK and qdescription is found in the queue true
when the stop device test response request is received
then the stop device test response request should return a stop device test response with result OK and description
cid-02 device-01 false NOT_FOUND
scenario stop device test response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a stop device test response request with correlationId cid-02 and deviceId device-01
and a stop device test response message with correlationId cid-02, deviceId , qresult and qdescription is found in the queue false
when the stop device test response request is received
then the stop device test response request should return a stop device test response with result NOT_FOUND and description
cid-03 device-01 true device-01 NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR
scenario stop device test response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a stop device test response request with correlationId cid-03 and deviceId device-01
and a stop device test response message with correlationId cid-03, deviceId device-01, qresult NOT_OK and qdescription VALIDATION ERROR is found in the queue true
when the stop device test response request is received
then the stop device test response request should return a stop device test response with result NOT_OK and description VALIDATION ERROR

Parameters:

  • correlationId: correlation Id returned from a stop device test request
  • content: message content
  • result: OK or exception


  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

Included page: .FlexOvl.DeviceInstallation.TearDown (edit)

com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests
